title: Relates to junior small and big game hunting license and the use of crossbows; repealer
summary: Relates to junior small and big game hunting license and the use of crossbows; provides that persons ages sixteen or seventeen may hunt big game; imposes a nine dollar fee for the junior small and big game license; makes related provisions.
